about_the_game:
LOVE SHOP Simulator 💕🛒 – a fun and quirky simulation game where you take charge of your very own love shop and turn it into the ultimate hotspot of pleasure and entertainment!

Roll up your sleeves, clean up the space, and arrange your products to catch the eye of your customers. Set competitive prices, keep an eye on market trends, and ensure your shop stays ahead of the game.

Key Features:
🔹 Product Placement – Arrange accessories, gadgets, and much more to create the perfect display!
🔹 Dynamic Pricing – Set prices, monitor the market, and adjust to demand.
🔹 Customer Service – Cater to your customers’ unique requests and quirky needs.
🔹 Shop Customization – Design your shop’s interior to match your vision and attract more visitors.
🔹 Charming Dancer Girls – Hire beautiful dancers to entertain customers and bring in even more traffic with dazzling shows!

With a mix of humor, strategy, and creative freedom, LOVE SHOP Simulator 💕🛒 lets you build your dream business and create a shop everyone will be talking about!

Join the fun and make your shop the ultimate destination in town – it’s time to turn passion into profit! 😏

content_descriptors.notes:
LOVE SHOP Simulator is a lighthearted game where you manage a shop selling love products, such as lingerie, novelty items, and other goods designed for intimacy wellness. While the game features mild romance themes, innuendo, and playful references to intimate topics, there is:

No explicit nudity
No graphic sexual acts

name: LOVE SHOP Simulator 💕🛒

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: LOVE SHOP Simulator 💕🛒 – manage your own love shop! Clean up, arrange products, set prices, and serve quirky customers. Customize your shop, monitor market trends, and hire charming dancers to attract visitors. Build your dream business with humor and creativity! 😏
